# SuggestedPaletteEntry.Green property

Green.

```csharp
public ushort Green { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

The minimum allowed value is `0`. The maximum allowed value is `255` (when the sPLT sample depth is `8`) or `65535` (when the sPLT sample depth is `16`). Values are not pre-multiplied by alpha, nor are they pre-composited against any background.
